title: Flag: St. Martin

adjectives: Of or pertaining to France or the people of France
Of or relating to the people or culture of France.
Of or relating to the French people.

Of or relating to Gaul or France.

To move or swing back and forth.

To move or swing a weapon back and forth, particularly if demonstrating skill.
nouns: Saint Martin is an island in the northeast Caribbean, approximately east of Puerto Rico.
A constituent country of the Kingdom of the Netherlands
Country on the Caribbean island of Saint Martin, part of the Kingdom of the Netherlands
Sint Maarten is a constituent country of the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
One of the constituent countries of the Kingdom of the Netherlands, located on the south of the island of Saint Martin in the Caribbean Sea.
An island in the northeast Caribbean, divided between France and the Netherlands
An island in the western Leeward Islands; administered jointly by France and the Netherlands
Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design
The national flag of France is a tricolor flag featuring three vertical bands colored blue, white, and red.
Whose colors are given as "bleu, blanc et rouge"

description: The flag for St. Martin, which may show as the letters MF on some platforms. This is the French half of the of the Caribbean island of Saint Martin. Not to be confused with Sint Maarten, the Dutch half of the same island.
apple_vendor_description: The flag of Saint Martin on Apple devices is rendered with vibrant, distinct colors, showcasing a bold blue stripe across the bottom and a red stripe across the top, separated by a white band. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading imbues the flag with a sense of depth and movement, as if gently waving. The realistic lighting catches the edges, giving it a polished, official appearance, perfect for representing travel or national pride.
